title: Ancient wyvern shield

It is one of the best Magic shields in the game, with stats comparable to that of the arcane spirit shield when fully charged, although lacking the extra 5 Magic attack bonus while having negative Melee and Ranged attack bonuses. However, it provides far superior defence.

SMW Subobject for ChargedHigh Alchemy value: 1200000Examine: A magical shield with a wyvern visage.Is members only: trueIs variant of: Ancient wyvern shieldUses infobox: ItemImage: File:Ancient wyvern shield.pngWeight: 4.535Value: 2000000Version anchor: ChargedRelease date: 7 September 2017Item ID: 21633
SMW Subobject for UnchargedHigh Alchemy value: 1200000Buy limit: 8Examine: A magical shield with a wyvern visage.Is members only: trueIs variant of: Ancient wyvern shieldImage: File:Ancient wyvern shield (uncharged).pngUses infobox: ItemWeight: 4.535Value: 2000000Version anchor: UnchargedRelease date: 7 September 2017Item ID: 21634

The ancient wyvern shield is a magical shield requiring a Magic level of 70 and a Defence level of at least 75 to equip, as well as having started Dragon Slayer I. It is one of the best Magic shields in the game, with stats comparable to that of the arcane spirit shield when fully charged, although lacking the extra 5 Magic attack bonus while having negative Melee and Ranged attack bonuses. However, it provides far superior defence.

The shield offers two special characteristics: it acts like a regular anti-dragon shield in terms of dragonfire protection, and it also protects against the icy breath of Wyverns, similar to the elemental, mind, and dragonfire shields. However, to the distinction of the elemental, mind, and other dragonfire shields, the ancient wyvern shield will also grant an immunity against the freezing effect from a wyvern's icy breath. This immunity, on the other hand, does not extend to draconic creatures capable of producing a similar effect (KBD, Vorkath, etc).

When the shield is obtained, it is uncharged and offers similar defensive bonuses to those of an adamant sq shield. When fully charged, it offers melee and magic defensive bonuses slightly higher than those of the dragonfire shield while having far worse ranged defence.

Creation[edit | edit source]

Requirements
SkillLevelXP
Smithing66 (b)2,000
Magic66 (b)2,000
Members
Ticks3 (1.8s)
ToolsFacilitiesStrange Machine
Materials
ItemQuantityCost
Elemental shield11,460
Wyvern visage121,999,825
Total Cost22,001,285
Ancient wyvern shield120,953,255
Profit−1,048,030
A player creating the ancient wyvern shield.

The ancient wyvern shield is created by using a wyvern visage on the northern strange machine in the House on the Hill while having a hammer and an elemental shield in the inventory. The creation process requires level 66 in Magic and Smithing, granting the player 2,000 Magic and Smithing experience, but the player's Magic level will be completely drained to 0. When this occurs, a chatbox message will appear, stating At a great cost to your personal magical energies, you have crafted the wyvern visage and elemental shield into an ancient wyvern shield.

The wyvern visage is dropped exclusively by Fossil Island Wyverns found in the Wyvern Cave, including the Spitting Wyvern, Taloned Wyvern, Long-tailed Wyvern and Ancient Wyvern. Skeletal Wyverns do not drop the wyvern visage; instead, they drop the draconic visage.

Icy breath charges[edit | edit source]

Charging[edit | edit source]

To charge the shield, players will need to use fossils or numulites on the shield, which are obtained from performing activities in Fossil Island. Players can right-click Recharge in the Worn Equipment tab to charge it, providing they have the required items in their inventory. Every charge increases its defence bonuses by +1, to a peak of a +50 Defence increase. However, its Magic Defence will remain the same.

Different types of fossils will give differing amounts of charges. Notably, identified rare fossils can not be used to charge the shield. Instead, they can be exchanged at the Fossil Collector for 500 Numulites, which can then be used to charge the shield.

  • Any type of unidentified fossil will only give one charge.
  • Small fossils will give one charge.
  • Medium and plant fossils will give two charges.
  • Large fossils will give three charges.
  • Numulites will give one charge per 500, requiring a total of 25,000 to fully charge it, costing 925,000.

Discharging[edit | edit source]

A player operating a charged ancient wyvern shield.

During combat, the ancient wyvern shield can be operated to expend one charge, unleashing a freeze blast attack (akin to those of wyverns) at a target, which can hit approximately 15 damage (slightly less than the melee and ranged variants). This attack can only be used once every two minutes, and each expended charge reduces the shield's Melee and Ranged defensive bonuses by one. The freeze blast can be used at range (up to 10 squares away) and over obstacles, after which the user will initiate a normal attack with their equipped weapon, if possible. The damage splat is rolled in accordance to the user's Defence level and target's Magic Defence bonus.

A player emptying a charged ancient wyvern shield.

Players can drain all of the ancient wyvern shield's charges at once by right-clicking the shield in the inventory and selecting Empty. This will release all of the shield's charges in a harmless burst, returning none of the items used to charge the shield. This function is useful when selling or trading the shield, as it can only be traded when completely uncharged.

In addition, if dropped on death in an unsafe environment, when recovered, the ancient wyvern shield will be completely uncharged.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
9 November 2017
(update)

The uncharged version was made darker to distinguish it from charged versions.

It is one of the best Magic shields in the game, with stats comparable to that of the [[arcane spirit shield]] when fully charged, although lacking the extra 5 Magic attack bonus while having negative [[Melee]] and [[Ranged]] attack bonuses. However, it provides far superior defence. The shield offers two special characteristics: it acts like a regular [[anti-dragon shield]] in terms of [[dragonfire]] protection, and it also protects against the icy breath of [[Wyverns]], similar to the [[Elemental shield|elemental]], [[Mind shield|mind]], and [[dragonfire shield]]s. However, to the distinction of the [[Elemental shield|elemental]], [[Mind shield|mind]], and other [[dragonfire shield]]s, the ancient wyvern shield will also grant an immunity against the freezing effect from a wyvern's [[icy breath]]. This immunity, on the other hand, '''does not''' extend to draconic creatures capable of producing a similar effect ([[KBD]], [[Vorkath]], etc). When the shield is obtained, it is uncharged and offers similar defensive bonuses to those of an [[adamant sq shield]]. When fully charged, it offers melee and magic defensive bonuses slightly higher than those of the [[dragonfire shield]] while having far worse ranged defence. {{Infobox Bonuses |version1 = Uncharged |version2 = Charged |astab = -10 |aslash = -10 |acrush = -10 |amagic = +15 |arange = -10 |dstab1 = +22 |dstab2 = +72 |dslash1 = +30 |dslash2 = +80 |dcrush1 = +25 |dcrush2 = +75 |dmagic = +15 |drange1 = -55 |drange2 = -5 |str = -2 |rstr = 0 |mdmg = 0 |prayer = 0 |slot = shield |altimage1 = [[File:Ancient wyvern shield (uncharged) equipped female.png|180px]] |altimage2 = [[File:Ancient wyvern shield equipped female.png|180px]] }} {{ToC}} ==Creation== {{Recipe |skill1 = Smithing |skill1lvl = 66 |skill1boostable = Yes |skill1exp = 2000 |skill2 = Magic |skill2lvl = 66 |skill2boostable = Yes |skill2exp = 2000 |members = Yes |ticks = 3 |facilities = Strange Machine (wyvern shield){{!}}Strange Machine |tools = Hammer |mat1 = Elemental shield |mat2 = Wyvern visage |output1 = Ancient wyvern shield }} [[File:Making_ancient_wyvern_shield.gif|thumb|210px|A player creating the ancient wyvern shield.]] The ancient wyvern shield is created by using a [[wyvern visage]] on the northern strange machine in the [[House on the Hill]] while having a [[hammer]] and an [[elemental shield]] in the inventory. The creation process requires level 66 in [[Magic]] and [[Smithing]], granting the player 2,000 Magic and Smithing experience, but the player's Magic level will be completely drained to 0. When this occurs, a chatbox message will appear, stating ''At a great cost to your personal magical energies, you have crafted the wyvern visage and elemental shield into an ancient wyvern shield.'' The wyvern visage is dropped exclusively by [[Fossil Island Wyvern]]s found in the [[Wyvern Cave]], including the [[Spitting Wyvern]], [[Taloned Wyvern]], [[Long-tailed Wyvern]] and [[Ancient Wyvern]]. [[Skeletal Wyvern]]s '''do not''' drop the wyvern visage; instead, they drop the [[draconic visage]]. ==Icy breath charges== ===Charging=== To charge the shield, players will need to use [[fossils]] or [[numulite]]s on the shield, which are obtained from performing activities in [[Fossil Island]]. Players can right-click ''Recharge'' in the [[Worn Equipment]] tab to charge it, providing they have the required items in their inventory. Every charge increases its defence bonuses by +1, to a peak of a +50 Defence increase. However, its [[Magic]] Defence will remain the same. Different types of fossils will give differing amounts of charges. Notably, identified rare fossils can '''not''' be used to charge the shield. Instead, they can be exchanged at the [[Fossil Collector]] for 500 [[Numulites]], which can then be used to charge the shield. *Any type of unidentified fossil will '''only give one charge'''. *Small fossils will give one charge. *Medium and plant fossils will give two charges. *Large fossils will give three charges. *Numulites will give one charge per 500, requiring a total of 25,000 to fully charge it, costing {{Coins|{{GEP|Numulite|25000}}}}. ===Discharging=== [[File:Operating ancient wyvern shield.gif|thumb|160px|left|A player operating a charged ancient wyvern shield.]] During [[combat]], the ancient wyvern shield can be operated to expend one charge, unleashing a freeze blast attack (akin to those of [[wyvern]]s) at a target, which can hit approximately 15 damage (slightly less than the melee and ranged variants). This attack can only be used once every two minutes, and each expended charge reduces the shield's [[Melee]] and [[Ranged]] defensive bonuses by one. The freeze blast can be used at range (up to 10 squares away) and over obstacles, after which the user will initiate a normal attack with their equipped weapon, if possible. The damage splat is rolled in accordance to the user's [[Defence]] level and target's [[Magic]] Defence bonus. [[File:Emptying ancient wyvern shield.gif|thumb|160px|A player emptying a charged ancient wyvern shield.]] Players can drain all of the ancient wyvern shield's charges at once by right-clicking the shield in the inventory and selecting ''Empty''. This will release all of the shield's charges in a harmless burst, returning none of the items used to charge the shield. This function is useful when selling or trading the shield, as it can only be traded when completely uncharged.
